channel.title: Dry Process on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)
channel.description: Recent content in Dry Process on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)

item.title: Ethiopia Grade 1 Dry Process Yirga Cheffe Dumerso
item.description: Sweet Maria’s This Dumerso dry-processed lot is a powerhouse in terms of fruit-forward aromatics. The dry-fragrance has a cornucopia of fruits, raspberry and ripe blueberry, Turkish apricots, grape juice, along with a substantial backdrop of bittersweet burnt sugars. The fruits approach floral dimensions, and a start jasmine note accents the ground coffee. The wet aromatics are equally intense, a representation of blackberry and strawberry toppings, a hint of dried mango, and a cacao-like bittersweetness in our roasts closer to Full City.

item.title: Blend
item.description: Blend 1lb Ethiopia Dry Process Yirga Cheffe Wenago 1⁄4 lb Sumatra Aceh-Mandheling Sweet Maria’s Wenago is a nice late season Ethiopia, and anything but subtle: strawberry, raspberry, red apple, stone fruit, fading to sweet tobacco and aromatic wood notes in the long finish. (and above) Very little stone flavors. Fairly bland. Maybe this isn’t good for cold brew? â˜¹
